original_text: Now the Hebrews who had been with the Philistines before that time and who had gone up with them into the camp, even they also turned to be with the Israelites who were with Saul and Jonathan.
korean_text: 전에 블레셋 사람들과 함께 하던 히브리 사람이 사방에서 블레셋 사람들과 함께 진영에 들어왔더니 그들이 돌이켜 사울과 요나단과 함께 한 이스라엘 사람들과 합하였고

sentences.original_text: who had been with the Philistines before that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그전에 블레셋 사람들과 함께 있었던 자들

sentences.original_text: and who had gone up with them into the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들과 함께 진영으로 올라갔던 자들

sentences.original_text: who were with Saul and Jonathan
